Login.greeting: Welcome to ORCA, our e-commerce website, Admin! We are thrilled to have you onboard. Here, you can manage products, track orders, and oversee the entire store efficiently. Thank you for being a crucial part of our team.

user.cannot cancel order warning message: Your order cannot be canceled once it has been shipped. However, you can request a refund upon receipt.

user.Please make sure you accept our policies: Please make sure you accept our policies
user.about orca description: We are a group of friends who came together to create ORCA. Fueled by a shared passion for fashion and individuality, we set out to build a brand that reflects who we are - bold, creative, and confident. Our goal is to craft high-quality, stylish pants that offer both comfort and versatility. With ORCA, you're not just wearing clothes; you're joining us on a journey that's all about celebrating unique style and the power of friendship.
user.success promocode message: You are now enjoying a {discount}% discount
